channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘South Park’ skewers Trump’s DC police takeover with tanks, Towelie, and Satan in bed
item.description: The White House has dismissed “South Park” as a fourth-rate, no-longer-relevant show.

item.description: I have arrived at countless D.C. crime scenes. The victim on the ground, grotesquely contorted, calling to me in their final moments.
